data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dupérré, Nadine (2015): Description of a new genus and thirteen new species of Ctenidae (Araneae, Ctenidae) from the Chocó region of Ecuador. Zootaxa 4028 (4): 451-484, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4028.4.1
